name: sajjadrad/jalali
description: This Package helps developers to easily work with Jalali (Shamsi or Iranian) dates in Laravel 4 applications, based on Jalali (Shamsi) DateTime class. This Package is based on a Laravel 3 bundle [sallar/laravel-jdate](https://github.com/sallar/laravel-jdate) by [Sallar Kaboli](http://sallar.me).This package converted from Laravel 3 bundle to Laravel 4 package by [Milad Rey](https://github.com/miladr/jalali).Older version of this library was unable to make a renge of numbers between two years in jalali with latin style.
